articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: Airbus takes a charge of nearly $1 billion on space programs - SpaceNews
articles.description: Airbus will take a charge of nearly $1 billion because of poor cost and schedule performance on satellite programs, and will evaluate strategic options.
articles.content: WASHINGTON Airbus will take a charge of nearly one billion dollars because of poor cost and schedule performance on a variety of satellite programs, and will evaluate strategic options for its space … [+3766 chars]
